alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 2:19PM MST until November 28 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches, with 6 to 12 inches expected above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to Midnight MST Sunday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
